question: Satyashodhak Samaj was founded by who among the following?
explanation: Satyashodhak Samaj was founded by Jyotirao Phule in the year 1873 (24th September) in Maharashtra. It was a social reform society devoted to truth-seeking. Savitribai (Wife of Jyotirao Phule) was the leader of the Women\'s section of Satyashodhak Samaj.
